function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High similarity between sars-cov-2 and bat coronaviruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High mortality rates of known coronaviruses mers-cov, sars-cov","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic and flu-like symptoms of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disrupted circadian sleep-wake rhythm leading to decreased immune defense","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manifestation of covid-19 as pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge on procedures to prevent the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission through droplets, aerosols, and direct contact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhalation of aerosols containing pathogens","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission through direct or indirect contact with infected people or contaminated surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about the vital concentration of sars-cov-2 necessary to infect a human from inanimate surfaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate screening protocols and guidelines for covid-19 testing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of serologic tests for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific treatments and vaccines for coronavirus infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of experimental and unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of drugs in treatment of sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Off-label use of favipiravir for sars-cov-2 treatment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investigation of new drugs for covid-19 therapy, such as tocilizumab and ace2-targeted treatments, may have unknown side effects and long-term impacts.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate evaluation of drugs for covid-19 therapy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with quarantine and surveillance measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trips to and from ’red’ areas with confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selective control and measurement of body temperature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of operators within confined environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitization procedures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contacts between work colleagues or other staff","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation room for suspicious cases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper hand washing leading to transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory contamination","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of disease through respiratory particles","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of filter masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of n95 masks with exhalation valve may not provide adequate protection from airborne
